title: CNBC Daily Open: Gold and silver tank amid Trump picking Kevin Warsh as Fed chair
summary_full: The U.S. dollar strengthened, signaling the market's approval of Warsh's credibility and perceived autonomy, but safe-haven assets gold and silver plummeted.
summary_public: The U.S. dollar strengthened, signaling the market's approval of Warsh's credibility and perceived autonomy, but safe-haven assets gold and silver plummeted.
